title.rendered: Saratoga Education Foundation Seeks School Community Members

content.rendered:
In 2014, The Saratoga Foundation for Innovative Learning (SFIL) was formed as a volunteer-driven education foundation for the Saratoga Springs City School District. With the mission to empower the school community and ignite the love of learning in all students, SFIL awarded 40 forward-thinking and creative grants to educators totaling nearly $150,000! In 2020, SFIL paused its work due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

The foundation is seeking school community members who are interested in re-imagining and re-launching the foundation. You can help support educational opportunities for students in Saratoga schools. If you are interested, please fill out the online form at https://forms.gle/m6DiRo4jHFBNWRsQ6.
